sentence.Network_en: They still get treated differently from almost every other contemporary British band.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们所得到的待遇仍然与当代几乎所有其他英国乐队都不同。

sentence.Network_en: The skeleton consists of differently shaped bones held together by ligaments.
sentence.Network_cn: 人体骨架是由依靠韧带连接的形状相异的骨头构成。

sentence.Network_en: The twins were dressed differently and one was thinner than the other.
sentence.Network_cn: 这对双胞胎穿着不同，而且其中一个偏瘦一点。

practise out loud , and say it differently each time ., 大声练习 , 每次以不同的方式陈述.
plants breathe differently , some are inhaled carbon dioxide exhaled oxygen , and others on the contrary ., 植物的呼吸方式不同 , 有些是吸入二氧化碳 , 呼出氧气 , 而有些则正相反.

list.abs: 字典中差字的解释 ... ◎ 差 chà (1) 区别[ difference] (1) 指派;派遣[ assign;dispatch;send on an errand].
...评价(金发维纳斯)(Blonde Venus,1932)显现再现系统中操纵女性，及父系制度中传授女性性欲为威胁的另一种方法。通过拜物化(fetishize)女性形象，男性尝试去否认其差异(difference)，另外，男性还让女性穿上他们的衣着，使之(雄性化)。影片中如此处理女主角，使女人之所以为女人的女性特质消失了，好似与男性相同。然而，我们会发现，因为父系的自恋倾向，这样反倒有了.
字典中乖字的解释 ... (4) 分离;离别[ separate] (1) 不同;差异[ different] (3) 反常;谬误[ abnormal;wrong].
人教版八年级上册英语单词表（含音标） ... 36 lifestyle n. 生活方式 41 different a. 不同的 42 difference n. 不同,差异.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... diet n. 饮食 differ v. 相异，有区别 difference n. 不同.

entry.def: If two people or things are different, they are not like each other in one or more ways.

example.ex: London was different from most European capitals...
example.tran: 伦敦同大多数欧洲国家的首都都有所不同。

example.ex: If he'd attended music school, how might things have been different?...
example.tran: 如果他上过音乐学校，事情会有怎样的不同呢？

entry.def: You use different to indicate that you are talking about two or more separate and distinct things of the same kind.

example.ex: Different countries specialised in different products...
example.tran: 不同国家专门生产不同的产品。

example.ex: The number of calories in different brands of drinks varies enormously.
example.tran: 不同牌子的饮料所含的卡路里数大不相同。

entry.tran: 不同寻常的;与众不同的
entry.def: You can describe something as different when it is unusual and not like others of the same kind.

example.ex: This recipe is certainly interesting and different.
example.tran: 这种烹饪法的确很有意思而且与众不同。

auth_sentence.content: Both were effective, each slightly differently than another.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both were effective, each slightly differently than another.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both were effective, each slightly differently than another.

auth_sentence.content: Some Congolese, though, see the Sapeurs differently.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some Congolese, though, see the Sapeurs differently.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some Congolese, though, see the Sapeurs differently.

auth_sentence.content: Today, many young women regard this world differently.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today, many young women regard this world differently.

Sentence.sentence: Every major scientific discovery began with someone imagining the world to look differently from the way others saw it.
In many cases though, the same idea is expressed differently.
Worldwide people speak differently from the way they write, and texting -quick, casual and only intended to be read once — is actually a way of talking with your fingers.
how differently words are used in texting
Monsanto and its supporters, not surprisingly, see the case very differently.

sentences.en: Different people might interpret events differently.
sentences.cn: 不同的人对事件的理解也可能不同。

sentences.en: I should have phrased my question differently.
sentences.cn: 我本应该换一种方式来提出我的问题。
